main_definition: A cue or prompt that helps someone remember to do something, often in the form of a note, alert, or phrase.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An object or device used to help recall tasks or events
meanings_and_examples.example: I set an alarm as a reminder to take my medication.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A prompt given by someone else to ensure one doesn't forget something important
meanings_and_examples.example: My friend sent me a message this morning as a reminder about our meeting at 3 PM.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An expression or phrase that serves as a mental cue for recalling information
meanings_and_examples.example: The saying 'Don't forget to bring your umbrella!' is a common weather-related reminder.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A digital notification, such as an email or app alert, designed to prompt action or remember tasks
meanings_and_examples.example: I received a calendar notification on my phone to remind me of the dentist appointment tomorrow.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A physical note or written message placed in a location where it can be seen regularly as a cue for an upcoming task or event
meanings_and_examples.example: I left a sticky note on my bathroom mirror reminding myself to buy groceries.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A figurative reference used by someone to help others remember something important or necessary
meanings_and_examples.example: His repeated mention of his dog, 'Remember our furry friend at home!', served as a reminder for everyone not to leave the door open.
